title: NBFCs told to play fair and square
description: The Reserve Bank of India advises non-banking financial companies, including microfinance and housing finance institutions, to prioritize compliance, adhere to fair practices, and sincerely address customer grievances. While monitoring these entities' exposures and risk practices, the RBI emphasizes the need for self-correction to avoid systemic risks, underscoring potential financial stability concerns with excessive returns and high indebtedness.
